Code evaluation
================================================================================

Assign and retrieve variables on the fly
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

### Assign/Get

```{r}
assign("x", mean(runif(10)))
get("x")

patientid <- "10"
assign(paste("treatment", patientid, sep=""),
       sample(c("control", "treatment"), 1))
treatment10
```

### Eval

```{r}
eval(parse(text=paste("i <- ","\"lots lots lots\"")))
i
```
